Name: Rhubarb Lucca Negroni
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist and rhubarb stick.
STRAIN into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).
EXPRESS orange zest twist over cocktail and discard.
Review: A rhubarb-influenced rift on the Negroni , which takes the classic from an aperitivo to a digestivo.
History: Adapted from a cocktail created in 2011 by Jonathan Abarbanel at Quo Vadis , London, England. Jonathan originally used Rhubarb-infused London dry gin. See: Negroni cocktail history
